thread.title: Ann Arbor to host LPGA event starting in 2016
thread.title_full: Ann Arbor to host LPGA event starting in 2016

author: detroitnews.com
title: Ann Arbor to host LPGA event starting in 2016
text:
Lexi Thompson won the Meijer LPGA Classic in Grand Rapids this year. (Photo: Stuart Franklin, Getty Images) 
22 CONNECT 9 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Ann Arbor's Travis Pointe Country Club will host a new LPGA Tour event beginning in 2016.
LPGA commissioner Michael Whan will announce the event on Wednesday at Travis Pointe.
It is not known where the new event might fall in the LPGA calendar.
Michigan has one LPGA Tour event, the Meijer Classic, at Blythefield Country Club in Grand Rapids. The Toledo area is also host to an annual tournament, the Marathon Classic at Highland Meadows Golf Club in Sylvania, Ohio. Both of those events took place in July in 2015.
